Type.Name: StateType

TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed StateType extends System.Enum

Type.ThreadSafetyStatement: Gtk# is thread aware, but not thread safe; See the Gtk# Thread Programming for details.

Docs.summary: An enumeration used to indicate the visual state of a .

remarks.para: This enumeration is used to indicate the current state of a widget; the state determines how the widget is draw.
This enumeration is also used to identify different colors in a for drawing, so states can be used for subparts of a widget as well as entire widgets.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Gtk.StateType Active = int32(1)

Docs.summary: State of a currently active widget, such as a depressed button.

remarks.para: State of a currently active widget, such as a depressed button.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Gtk.StateType Insensitive = int32(4)

Docs.summary: State indicating that the widget is unresponsive to user actions.

remarks.para: State indicating that the widget is unresponsive to user actions.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Gtk.StateType Normal = int32(0)
.field public static literal valuetype Gtk.StateType Prelight = int32(2)

Docs.summary: State indicating that the mouse pointer is over the widget and the widget will respond to mouse clicks.

remarks.para: State indicating that the mouse pointer is over the widget and the widget will respond to mouse clicks.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Gtk.StateType Selected = int32(3)

Docs.summary: State of a selected item, such the selected row in a list.

remarks.para: State of a selected item, such the selected row in a list.
